name: Sesame Soy Chicken Enoki Mushroom
description: This Sesame Soy Chicken Enoki Mushroom dish is a perfect blend of succulence and health, tailored for those on a low-carb, low-sugar diet. It's been crafted with a special focus on healthy living, featuring a delightful mix of sesame seeds, tender chicken, and Golden Mushroom, all flavored with coconut amino and a hint of spices. A dish that doesn't just satisfy your taste buds but also aligns with your health-conscious lifestyle.
recipeIngredient: 0.50  tbsp(s) Seeds, sesame seeds, whole, dried

recipeInstructions.text: Start by rinsing the Golden Mushroom under cold water and draining thoroughly.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Dice the Red Onion and mince the Garlic.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the chicken into small, bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, mix together the Coconut Amino, ground Spices, pepper, black, Salt, and Sesame Seeds to create the marinade.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Toss the chicken pieces in the marinade and let sit for at least 20 minutes to absorb the flavors.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the Butter in a large skillet over medium heat and add the diced Red Onion and minced Garlic. Saut√© until they become translucent and fragrant, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Increase the heat to medium-high and add the marinated chicken to the skillet. Cook until the chicken is thoroughly cooked, about 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Finally, add the Golden Mushroom to the skillet and stir-fry for an additional 5 minutes, until the mushrooms are tender and the flavors are well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
